'Here you go, Sho. Say ahh!'%K%P
'Ahh. *Munch*'%K%P
I chewed on the piece of omelet\nMaika offered me.%K%P
'What do you think? I tried changing the recipe\na little this time.'%K%P
'Mmm, it's good.'%K%P
'Yay! Okay, try some of this salmon next.'%K%P
'Mmm... This is great, not too salty.\nOf course, everything tastes good\nwhen you make it.'%K%P
'Oh, Sho, you charmer!'%K%P
Seeing Maika blush and smile like that, I was ready\nto take on anything.%K%P
'Are these two for real?'%K%P
'They've just started going out, it's natural for\nthem to be like this at first.'%K%P
'Well, as long as they're happy, I guess.'%K%P
'But what about us? I don't know where to look here.'%K%P
'Sho, you've got a grain of rice...\nHere, let me get it for you.'%K%P
'Oh, thank you, Maika.'%K%P
'No need to thank me. I am your girlfriend, right?'%K%P
'I had no idea couples like this really existed.'%K%P
'I think it's lovely that they're so affectionate.'%K%P
Akane and Inori were saying...something,\nbut I wasn't really paying attention.%K%P
I was in heaven.%K%P
'Sho?'%K%P
'Yeah?'%K%P
'I just like saying your name. Heehee.'%K%P
'Ha, I know what you mean. Maika.'%K%P
'Sho.'%K%P
'Maika.'%K%P
'So, Inori... This rice is kinda sweet today, huh?'%K%P
'Oh, yes, indeed. The tea, too.\nI wonder if there's\nmore sugar in it than usual.'%K%P
Was it just me, or did those two seem\na little uncomfortable?%K%P
'What's wrong, guys?\nIs something wrong with\nthe food?'%K%P
'Is it because of the changes I made?\nIs it too sweet?'%K%P
She'd changed it to suit my tastes, after all.%K%P
Maybe that was it. Akane and Inori just weren't used\nto this new flavor yet.%K%P
'No, no. I've got no complaints about the food.\nRight, Inori?'%K%P
'Right. It's delicious.\nThere's certainly nothing\nwrong with the food.'%K%P
'So what's up?'%K%P
'I can't believe they haven't noticed.\nHow long is this gonna last?'%K%P
'Don't get me wrong, I'm very happy for them...\nBut having to watch them like this may\nbecome a little tiring...'%K%P
Maika and I looked at the two goddesses,\ncompletely dumbfounded.%K%P
'I think maybe I'll go out somewhere today.\nThe air in this place is too much for me.'%K%P
'I agree. Let's allow these two some time alone.'%K%P
'Okay, we'll be going then, bye!'%K%P
'Oh, all right. Take care.'%K%P
'Sure, if you say so.'%K%P
Apparently Maika and I would have the house to\nourselves this afternoon.%K%P
This was going to be great.%K%P
After seeing off the two goddesses, we decided\nto tackle the remaining housework.%K%P
'Okay, that should do it.'%K%P
I finished up cleaning the corridors, and realized my\nbreathing had gotten heavy.%K%P
Tsubaki was pretty big, after all. I worked up quite\na sweat doing a full circuit of the place.%K%P
'I should take a bath before getting back\nto Maika.'%K%P
I didn't want to subject her to my company while\nI was still so sweaty.%K%P
I returned to my room, threw off most of my\nclothes and headed for the bathroom.%K%P
'A whole afternoon with Maika...'%K%P
The housework was done and Akane and Inori wouldn't\nbe back for a while. Hanging out with Maika in her\nroom would be a fun way to spend the rest of the day.%K%P
'Gotta clean myself off first, though.'%K%P
Still partly in a daze, I swung open the door\nto the bathroom.%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
'Ah.'%K%P
Maika was already inside, in the process of getting\nundressed and now in only her underwear.%K%P
'Sh-Sho...?'%K%P
'Uh, wow, uh... This door wasn't locked, was it?'%K%P
I did have to turn the doorknob a few times,\nbut it had opened easily enough.%K%P
For a moment neither of us said a word.%K%P
In my head I knew I should look away and close the\ndoor, but Maika's body captured my attention.%K%P
'Hey...'%K%P
'Yeah?'%K%P
'Wh-Why are you trying to get in here?!'%K%P
'Oh!'%K%P
Maika was starting to get flustered.%K%P
'No way, I forgot to lock it?! I-I just didn't want\nto come see you while I was still sweaty and, and--'%K%P
'You know that wouldn't bother me, right?'%K%P
'That's not the point!'%K%P
'How long are you gonna keep staring?!'%K%P
'Oh, sorry! You just look so beautiful...!'%K%P
For some reason that calmed Maika down.%K%P
'Y-You really think I look good...?\nYou like my body, Sho?'%K%P
'Of course I do...'%K%P
Aw, crud!%K%P
I just sort of answered on reflex!%K%P
But rather than getting mad, Maika seemed\nto take it as a compliment.%K%P
'Heh, really now? Perhaps you'd like to look\na little more, then?'%K%P
'If...you insist...'%K%P
Since I had permission now, I let my eyes wander all\nover Maika's body.%K%P
All the way along her slender arms, across her\nwell-endowed chest and back down\nthe curves of her hips...%K%P
She looked good from every angle.%K%P
And this was the girl I was going out with.\nI must be the luckiest guy in the world.%K%P
'Y-You know...\nBeing stared at like this...\nI don't think I can...'%K%P
Maika shifted and fidgeted, her face going\nredder by the moment.%K%P
'Something wrong?'%K%P
'Maika? Hey, come on.'%K%P
